ingredients.ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts in water, drained
½ pound fresh crabmeat, picked over for cartilage and shell fragments

cookingTips: Pick through crabmeat carefully to remove any shell fragments for smooth texture
Soften cream cheese at room temperature for easier blending
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This rich dip combines sweet crabmeat with creamy cheese. How will you balance the seafood flavor with the cream cheese base?
